bio.title: About me
content: I'm Guilherme Almeida, a 24-year-old Full Stack web and mobile developer based in Manaus, Brazil. Currently focused on React + Next, Node + Nest, Java and UI/UX design but with knowledge in several other technologies as well.

I have a Technical Degree in Informatics with emphasis on Software Engineering and a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from the Federal University of Amazonas, totaling 8 years of academic experience.

While most of my experience lies in front-end development, I consider myself to be just as good in other fields such as a back-end development and software architecture, not to mention my artistic background and genuine passion for technology.

content.degree: Certificate Course in Embedded Android Development

content.description: Created software on demand and automated tasks using React, PHP, Node, Java and Python; designed applications from scratch, including UI/UX design, front-end and back-end development and deployment, mostly using FTP; webscrapping using Python and Scrapy.

My main project while working in this company was Banco do Brasil's investments page, where I actuated as a Front-end Developer and worked mostly with React, Next, CI/CD operations and UI/UX designer in some tasks too.
As a Front-end Developer, my main projects were CVC’s bus ticket platforms Rodofácil and Rodoviário Exclusivo, where I worked mostly with TypeScript, React and Jest.

Developing Web3 based solutions using mostly Python + Django and React while integrating our software with multiple blockchains, crypto payment methods and cloud services. Also working as UI/UX designer on multiple projects.
Working mostly with front-end engineering while integrating multiple projects with accessibility tools such as screen readers and high contrast displays.
